feed.title: Auramance
feed.subtitle: A Tabletop RPG ruleset and resource

entry.title: Welcome to the new wiki
entry.content: Welcome to the brand new wiki for Auramance! I’ll be slowly migrating pages here and cleaning up each page’s style. For now, links that I think may be most useful to new users will be in the navbar.
